value: Forest Hill Chase Shopping Cen 270 Canterbury Road, Forest Hill, 3131, VIC, Australia

5411 - Grocery Stores Summary > C F C RETAIL PTY LTD is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover grocery stores. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. C F C RETAIL PTY LTD is headquartered in Forest Hill, Victoria. It is headed by director & company secretary Gary Anthony Jebb. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $34.02 million. Its net loss totalled $4,000. C F C RETAIL PTY LTD forms part of the retail trade industry sector.
